name: Shalku Frostbite
descriptionForm: Tank / Damage : Ice Krok is a personal favorite of mine, it has the versatility of shielding and damage that gets better with each tier upgrade
description1: Mummy Wraps: Place a 75 shield and a stun block [0 pips]
description2: Snow Stalker: Deal 75 damage, or 150 and clears blade if enemy has one [1 pip]
description3: Crystal Scarab: Deal 150 damage and place 125 shield on self if enemy have a trap [2 pips]
description4: Ancient Wraps: Place a 200 shield and a stun block [2 pips]
description6: Shivering Marid: Deal 125 damage to all enemies, or 250 and clears blade if enemy has one [4 pips]
description7: Chilling Touch: Deal 50 damage and stun enemy if they have a trap [0 pips]
description8: Disarming Trap: Place a 225 trap on enemy and another 125 trap to clear blade if enemy has one (Traps do not stack, 125 trap will be used first)[3 pips]
description9: Recycle Ward: Place a 100 shield and clear trap for another 100 shield [1 pips]
description10: Shivering Marid: Deal 200 damage to all enemies, increases to 325 if enemy has a weakness/mantle [5 pips]

name: Sutekh Thunderscales
description1: Blistering Bolt: Deal 50 damage and remove enemy HoT [0 pips]
description2: Rallying Blade: Place a 125 blade and remove DoT [1 pip]
description3: Twin Blades: Place a 125 blade and a 125 blade on self (Does not Stack) [2 pips]
description4: Thresher: Deal 200 damage or 300 damage if your HP is less then 50% [2 pips]
description5: Bloodletter: Deal 150 damage to all enemies and remove enemy HoTs [4 pips]
description6: Desperate Daimyo: Deal 250 damage to all enemies or 350 damage if your HP is less then 50% [5 pips]
description7: Furious Resolve: Place a 100 blade on whole team and remove DoTs [4 pips]
description8: Serpent's Twist: Deal 200 damage and stun enemy if your HP is less than 50% [2 pips]
description9: Energetic Golem: Deal 200 damage to all enemies and gain 2 pips if your HP is less than 50% [4 pips]
description10: Krakaen's Decree: Deal 100 damage per pip [X pips]

name: Kroksus Battlemaster
description1: Troop Bolster: Place a 50 shield on an ally [0 pips]
description2: Summon Elephant: Summon minion or add to +50 damage cards to deck if your minion already summoned [0 pips]
description3: Feed The Troll: Deal 75 damage and place a 150 trap if enemy has taunt active [1 pip]
description4: Jaws Of The Krok: Place a 200 trap and an afterlife that places a 100 trap on enemy team if enemy has taunt active [2 pips]
description5: Appropriate Force: Deal 150 damage or 200 damage if you have a minion summoned [2 pips]
description6: Bug Bomb: Deal 200 damage to all enemies or 250 if you have a minion summoned [5 pips]
description7: Raging River: Deal 225 damage and place a 100 trap if you have a shield [3 pips]
description8: Battle Rush: Clear mantle for a 75 shield(self) and then deal 150 damage [2 pips]
description9: Hold Them Down: Place a 150 trap then stun yourself [1 pip]
description10: Legends Of Spiders: Clear mantle for a 125 shield on whole team then deal 225 damage to all enemies [6 pips]

name: Horus Lifewielder
descriptionForm: Heal / Empower -- This is a garbage form do not use
description1: Primal Blade: Place a +50 blade and active HoT [0 pips]
description2: Imp Mischief: Deal 75 damage and detonate DoT, +50 to DoT if you have a blade [1 pip]
description3: Gift Of Life: Add 1 card to whole team hand that heals 100 for 1 pip [2 pips]
description4: Lifecycle: Deal a 100, 4 turn DoT to enemy and a 150, 3 turn HoT on self. Turns into 300, 4 turn Hot on self if enemy team has a minion [2 pips]
description5: Cat Attack!: Deal 225 damage or clear DoT on self for 300 damage [3 pips]
description6: Light Of Life: Place a 200 heal blade on whole team and clear trap for a heal card in hand [4 pips]
description7: Rejuvenate: Place a 300, 4 turn HoT and clear trap for 100 heal blade
description8: Ankh Blade: Place a 100 heal blade and clear trap fora heal card in hand [1 pip]
description9: Bantam Strike!: Deal 150 damage and get a 150, 3 turn HoT if you have a blade [2 pips]
description10: Dance Of Destiny: Deal 200, 4 turn DoT to all enemies and a 150, 3 turn HoT on team. Turns into 300, 4 turn Hot if enemy team has a minion [5 pips]

name: Nekroksis Hekai
description1: Troll's Trade: Deal 75, 3 turn DoT and steal an enemy HoT [0 pips]
description2: Dangerous Deal: Take 50 damage then heal for 100 [0 pips]
description3: Drops of Death: Take 75 damage then deal a 200, 4 turn DoT on enemy [1 pip]
description4: Buccaneer's Raid: Deal 200 damage and clear blade for a -100 heal blade [2 pips]
description5: Mephitis: Place an afterlife on someone on your team that places 200 trap on all enemies [3 pips]
description6: Rodent's Ripoff: Deal a 300, 4 turn Dot to all enemies and steal a HoT [5 pips]
description7: Pound of Flesh: Take 125 damage then deal 250 damage [2 pips]
description8: Stanchion: Place a -75 weakness on enemy and gain a stun block [1 pip]
description9: Hurtful Heal: Take 250 damage then heal whole team for 150 [4 pips]
description10: Pumpkin's Plunder: Steal 75 HP from all enemies for yourself [3 pips]

name: Maat Justwarden
description1: Exchange Of Fate: Swap shield / trap then gift a pip [0 pips]
description2: Tip The Scales: Place a protected 125 trap on enemy and a 50 shield on self [1 pip]
description3: Shifting Sands: Swap shield / trap with enemy then deal 100 damage
description4: Deadly Sting: Deal 200 damage and place a 100 trap if enemy has a shield / trap [2 pips]
description5: Grave Imbalance: Place a protected 125 trap on all enemies and a 75 shield on your team [4 pips]
description6: Tide Of Doom: Deal 250 damage to all enemies [5 pips]
description7: Embiggen: Place a 150 shield and clear a shield / trap for a +50 damage, 3 turn bubble [2 pips]
description8: Sand Trap: Deal 225 damage and stun enemy if there is a minion on the field [3 pips]
description9: Sorcerer's Portent: Deal 200 damage and place a 100 anti-heal shield [4 pips]
description10: Mark Of Moirai: Place a +50 trap, 2 turn bubble on a enemy [3 pips]
